name: breakblock
description:
Wall Breaker is a game to take your break, and make you comfortable with my game , there will be several stages in this game and will be updated in future.

Controls :

  • Mouse : move paddle.
  • Left Click : launch ball.

Thanks to these people for the great assets :

  • Michael Briscoe - Paddle sprite /Bamboo Sprite/ Ball Sprite
  • C PasteGame - 2D BackGround Game Jamle Cross - Sprite Brick Orange and Blue
  • Pandemonium - Sprite Sword  

Thanks for Playing.

I will update this game content later.
